name: Freshworks CRM
natural_language_description: 这是 Freshworks CRM 节点。主要用于: Consume the Freshworks CRM API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: account

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many tasks

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the deal | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: creater_id (值: None) - ID of the user who created the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
outcome_id (值: None) - ID of the outcome of the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
task_type_id (值: None) - ID of the type of task

accountId.name: accountId
accountId.description: ID of the account to update
accountId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Account ID | 作用: ID of the account to update | (必填项)

view.name: view
view.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
view.natural_language_description: 参数名: View Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: creater_id (值: None) - ID of the user who created the sales activity. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
dueDate (值: None) - Timestamp that denotes when the task is due to be completed
outcome_id (值: None) - ID of the outcome of the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
owner_id (值: None) - ID of the user to whom the task is assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
targetable_id (值: None) - ID of the entity for which the task is updated. The type of entity is selected in "Target Type".
targetable_type (值: None) - Type of the entity for which the task is updated
task_type_id (值: None) - ID of the type of task
title (值: None) - Title of the task

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Title of the task | (必填项)

fromDate.name: fromDate
fromDate.description: Timestamp that denotes the start of appointment. Start date if this is an all-day appointment.
fromDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Date | 作用: Timestamp that denotes the start of appointment. Start date if this is an all-day appointment. | (必填项)

endDate.name: endDate
endDate.description: Timestamp that denotes the end of appointment. End date if this is an all-day appointment.
endDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: End Date | 作用: Timestamp that denotes the end of appointment. End date if this is an all-day appointment. | (必填项)

attendees.name: attendees
attendees.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attendees | 默认值: {}

appointmentId.name: appointmentId
appointmentId.description: ID of the appointment to update
appointmentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Appointment ID | 作用: ID of the appointment to update | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | 作用: First name of the contact | (必填项)

lastName.name: lastName
lastName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | 作用: Last name of the contact | (必填项)

emails.name: emails
emails.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email Address | 作用: Email addresses of the contact | (必填项)

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: ID of the contact to update
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: ID of the contact to update | (必填项)

amount.name: amount
amount.natural_language_description: 参数名: Amount | 作用: Value of the deal | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

dealId.name: dealId
dealId.description: ID of the deal to update
dealId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal ID | 作用: ID of the deal to update | (必填项)

description.name: description
description.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: Content of the note | (必填项)

targetableType.name: targetableType
targetableType.description: Type of the entity for which the task is updated
targetableType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Target Type | 作用: Type of the entity for which the task is updated | 默认值: Contact | (必填项)

targetable_id.name: targetable_id
targetable_id.description: ID of the entity for which the task is created. The type of entity is selected in "Target Type".
targetable_id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Target ID | 作用: ID of the entity for which the task is created. The type of entity is selected in "Target Type". | (必填项)

noteId.name: noteId
noteId.description: ID of the note to update
noteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Note ID | 作用: ID of the note to update | (必填项)

sales_activity_type_id.displayName: Sales Activity Type Name or ID
sales_activity_type_id.name: sales_activity_type_id
sales_activity_type_id.description: ID of a sales activity type for which the sales activity is created. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
sales_activity_type_id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sales Activity Type Name or ID | 作用: ID of a sales activity type for which the sales activity is created. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

ownerId.name: ownerId
ownerId.description: ID of the user to whom the task is assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
ownerId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Owner Name or ID | 作用: ID of the user to whom the task is assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

from_date.name: from_date
from_date.description: Timestamp that denotes the end of sales activity
from_date.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Date | 作用: Timestamp that denotes the end of sales activity | (必填项)

end_date.name: end_date
end_date.description: Timestamp that denotes the end of sales activity
end_date.natural_language_description: 参数名: End Date | 作用: Timestamp that denotes the end of sales activity | (必填项)

salesActivityId.name: salesActivityId
salesActivityId.description: ID of the salesActivity to update
salesActivityId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sales Activity ID | 作用: ID of the salesActivity to update | (必填项)

query.name: query
query.description: Enter a term that will be used for searching entities
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Term | 作用: Enter a term that will be used for searching entities | (必填项)

entities.name: entities
entities.description: Enter a term that will be used for searching entities
entities.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search on Entities | 作用: Enter a term that will be used for searching entities | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

searchField.name: searchField
searchField.description: Field against which the entities have to be searched
searchField.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Field | 作用: Field against which the entities have to be searched | (必填项)
available_options: Custom Field (值: customField) - Only allowed custom fields of type "Text field", "Number", "Dropdown" or "Radio button"

customFieldName.name: customFieldName
customFieldName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Custom Field Name | (必填项)

customFieldValue.name: customFieldValue
customFieldValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Custom Field Value | (必填项)

fieldValue.name: fieldValue
fieldValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Field Value | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: entities (值: None) - Use 'entities' to query against related entities. You can include multiple entities at once, provided the field is available in both entities or else you'd receive an error response.

dueDate.name: dueDate
dueDate.description: Timestamp that denotes when the task is due to be completed
dueDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Due Date | 作用: Timestamp that denotes when the task is due to be completed | (必填项)

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.description: ID of the task to update
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | 作用: ID of the task to update | (必填项)
